languages.text: "Благодарю вас. Вольный Торговец не должен тратить время на то, что могут решить его подданные и доверенные лица, но в этом случае ваше вмешательство было необходимо. Не только для моей семьи, но и для вашей торговой династии".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю вас. Вольный Торговец не должен тратить время на то, что могут решить его подданные и доверенные лица, но в этом случае ваше вмешательство было необходимо. Не только для моей семьи, но и для вашей торговой династии".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас. Вольный Торговец не должен тратить время на то, что могут решить его подданные и доверенные лица, но в этом случае ваше вмешательство было необходимо. Не только для моей семьи, но и для вашей торговой династии".

traits.locale_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your interference was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for the sake of your trading dynasty as well."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your interference was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for the sake of your trading dynasty as well."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your interference was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trading dynasty as well."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「心より感謝いたします。従者の問題は自由開拓者が時間を浪費すべきではなく、管財人が解決するものです。しかし今回は、我が家のためのみならず、あなたの貿易王朝のためにもあなたの介入が不可欠でした」
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: 「心より感謝いたします。従者の問題は自由開拓者が時間を浪費すべきではなく、管財人が解決するものです。しかし今回は、我が家のためのみならず、あなたの貿易王朝のためにもあなたの介入が不可欠でした」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “请允许我向您致谢。照理来说，行商浪人不该把时间浪费在他的仆人与代理人可以自行解决的问题上，但今天，多亏有您出手相助。我感激您，不仅仅是为了我的家族，也是为了贸易王朝的利益。”
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我向您致谢。照理来说，行商浪人不该把时间浪费在他的仆人与代理人可以自行解决的问题上，但今天，多亏有您出手相助。我感激您，不仅仅是为了我的家族，也是为了贸易王朝的利益。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je tenais à vous remercier. D'ordinaire, {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne devrait pas perdre son temps avec de telles broutilles, mais il faut admettre que dans ce cas précis, votre intervention était nécessaire. Non seulement pour le bien de ma famille, mais également pour celui de toute votre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: « Je tenais à vous remercier. D'ordinaire, {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne devrait pas perdre son temps avec de telles broutilles, mais il faut admettre que dans ce cas précis, votre intervention était nécessaire. Non seulement pour le bien de ma famille, mais également pour celui de toute votre dynastie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Le doy las gracias. {mf|Un|Una} Comerciante Independiente no tendría por qué perder el tiempo en asuntos de sirvientes, pero en este caso, necesitábamos de su ayuda, no solo por el bien de mi familia, sino también por el de su dinastía comercial».
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: «Le doy las gracias. {mf|Un|Una} Comerciante Independiente no tendría por qué perder el tiempo en asuntos de sirvientes, pero en este caso, necesitábamos de su ayuda, no solo por el bien de mi familia, sino también por el de su dinastía comercial».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch. {mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} sollte keine Zeit auf Angelegenheiten vergeuden, die {mf|ihre|seine} Diener und Treuhänder erledigen können. Doch in diesem Fall war Euer Einschreiten notwendig. Nicht nur um meiner Familie willen, auch um Eurer Handelsdynastie willen."
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch. {mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} sollte keine Zeit auf Angelegenheiten vergeuden, die {mf|ihre|seine} Diener und Treuhänder erledigen können. Doch in diesem Fall war Euer Einschreiten notwendig. Nicht nur um meiner Familie willen, auch um Eurer Handelsdynastie willen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Size müteşekkirim. Hür Tacir, hizmetkârlarının ve sağkollarının çözebileceği mevzularla vaktini heba etmemelidir. Fakat bu meselede müdahaleniz gerekmekteydi. Yalnızca hanemin değil, ticaret hanedanlığınızın da iyiliği için."
languages.original_text: "You have my thanks. A Rogue Trader should not waste time on the matters that {mf|his|her} servants and trustees can resolve, but in this case, your intervention was necessary. Not just for the sake of my family, but for your trade dynasty as well."

traits.locale_text: "Size müteşekkirim. Hür Tacir, hizmetkârlarının ve sağkollarının çözebileceği mevzularla vaktini heba etmemelidir. Fakat bu meselede müdahaleniz gerekmekteydi. Yalnızca hanemin değil, ticaret hanedanlığınızın da iyiliği için."
